backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for recent updates including the new final page and navigation changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining Valentine-themed light and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with five routes and wraps everything in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Responsive grid gallery component with dialog-based lightbox for viewing photos.
frontend/src/components/RouteTransitionO: Full-screen overlay animating particle effects during route transitions, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
Bottom pager enabling previous/next navigation across the five defined routes.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Main layout with header, navigation, footer, and route transition overlay around routed content.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Top navigation bar listing five pages with icons and active-state styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: React hook that returns whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables, typography, animations, and background for the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/Page1Landing.tsx: Landing page showing animated hearts, a long Valentine’s message, and two uploaded photos.
frontend/src/pages/Page2Memories.tsx: Displays a heading and a photo gallery of four memory images.
frontend/src/pages/Page3Flowers.tsx: Shows a flower icon, a generated flower image, and an emotional message.
frontend/src/pages/Page4Gallery.tsx: Renders an additional gallery of remaining uploaded photos with a header.
frontend/src/pages/Page5Final.tsx: Final page displaying four comic-style images showing where the story began.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, container settings, and custom keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the Valentine’s website.
